needle sewing needle bring out your dead pattern notes uk crochet symbols are used throughout this pattern see http //www simplycrochetmag co uk/2013/07/04/uk-and-us-crochet-conversion- chart/ for conversions gauge is not critical but keep stitches tight to prevent stuffing from leaking out stitches used slip_stitch double_crochet decrease crab stitch reverse double_crochet magic_ring crab stitch tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=k7xokueiknm where indicated use the invisible fasten_off to ensure the edge is neat http //www stitch-story com/2010/12/invisible-fasten-off-one-of-my-favorite html project should be assembled as individual parts are constructed plastic eyes can be used in place of buttons but may be difficult to secure through two layers of material besides buttons are creepier see coraline head and body start with grey yarn foundation 6 st magic_ring round 1 2dc in each st 12 st round 2 *2dc in 1 st 1dc* repeat ** 24 st change to black yarn round 16 working in front loops only *2dc in 1 st 3dc* repeat ** to end 30 st round 17 double_crochet to end of round 30 st round 18 *2dc in 1 st 4dc* repeat ** to end 36 st round 19 double_crochet to end of round 36 st round 20 *2dc in 1 st 5dc* repeat ** to end 42 st round 21 slip_stitch into first stitch of round 20 chain 1 crab stitch to end of round 42 st break yarn and pull through weave in yarn end continuing with black yarn join yarn to the back loop of the first stitch of round 15 round 22 working in back loops only slip_stitch double_crochet to end of round 24 st round 23-25 double_crochet to end of round 24 st round 26 *2dc in 1 st 3dc* repeat **
